snippet.title: Detective Dotson Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2450840/Detective_Dotson/
Check out some of our first multi-genre episodic missions
 
Mission 1: Shoplifter on the Ganga Ghat
Spot the shoplifter and then chase him down as you play a platformer on the Ganga Ghat

Mission 2: The Deal
A very illegal deal is going down in broad daylight
If you can just get close enough and capture it 
Don't get too close though or the bodyguard will slug you

In each mission you can choose your disguise, your team and your tools. Your choices matter to the outcome!
